en.company_slogan: Weaving the Fabric of the Digital Age
en.descr_section_content: Quatrain Technologies carries a twenty-year expertise in web software development and lifecycle. Working side-by-side with various companies and institutions of all sizes, our Team focuses on helping organizations reach the technical goals of their projects, whether software related, hardware related or both.

en.prom_subsection1_content: Immerged in disruptive trends and seasoned with years of software architecture & development, we provide a 360 degrees vision on digital endeavours.
en.prom_subsection2_subtitle: Hand and Mind as the two ends of our digital extent.
en.prom_subsection2_content: Equipped with state of the art 3D printing and electronic development, we can put our idea into devices and appliances.
en.prom_subsection3_content: Software has become our choice mobility friend with Cloud as its backbone and fast growing pill. Anyone with the right skills can compete and reach to billions of users.
en.prom_subsection4_content: Leveraging on Machine Learning with the help of qualified data, we design and provide predictive models to forward thinking industries.
